original_text: So I decided to punish you. I took from you things that belonged to you. I gave your enemies, the Philistines, power over you. Even they were ashamed because of the disgusting things that you were doing.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 손을 네 위에 펴서 네 일용할 양식을 감하고 너를 미워하는 블레셋 여자 곧 네 더러운 행실을 부끄러워하는 자에게 너를 넘겨 임의로 하게 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: So I decided to punish you.
I took from you things that belonged to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네게 속한 것들을 너에게서 빼앗았다.

sentences.original_text: I gave your enemies, the Philistines, power over you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 대적들인 블레셋 사람에게 너를 다스릴 권세를 주었다.

sentences.original_text: Even they were ashamed because of the disgusting things that you were doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 하던 역겨운 일 때문에 그들조차 부끄러워했다.
